scenarios.name: Create mobile business
scenarios.prompt: insert into bizes id = biz_mobile_uc15 name = MikesMobileGrooming slug = mikes-mobile-uc15 status = active timezone = America/Los_Angeles

scenarios.name: Create base location
scenarios.prompt: insert into locations id = loc_uc15 biz_id = biz_mobile_uc15 name = MobileBase slug = mobile-base timezone = America/Los_Angeles

scenarios.name: Create groomer user
scenarios.prompt: insert into users id = usr_mike_uc15 email = mike.uc15@example.com name = MikeGroomer status = active

scenarios.name: Create groomer resource
scenarios.prompt: insert into resources id = res_mike biz_id = biz_mobile_uc15 location_id = loc_uc15 type = host host_user_id = usr_mike_uc15 name = MikeResource slug = mike-resource timezone = America/Los_Angeles capacity = 1 allow_simultaneous_bookings = false

scenarios.name: Create host profile with travel radius
scenarios.prompt: insert into host_users id = hu_mike_uc15 biz_id = biz_mobile_uc15 resource_id = res_mike user_id = usr_mike_uc15 travel_radius_miles = 20 max_daily_bookings = 8

scenarios.name: Create service group
scenarios.prompt: insert into service_groups id = sg_mobile_uc15 biz_id = biz_mobile_uc15 name = MobileServices slug = mobile-services status = active

scenarios.name: Create mobile grooming service
scenarios.prompt: insert into services id = svc_grooming_uc15 biz_id = biz_mobile_uc15 service_group_id = sg_mobile_uc15 name = MobileGrooming slug = mobile-grooming type = appointment visibility = public status = active

scenarios.name: Create transport route
scenarios.prompt: insert into transport_routes id = tr_daily_uc15 biz_id = biz_mobile_uc15 name = DailyServiceRoute slug = daily-service-route status = active origin_location_id = loc_uc15 destination_location_id = loc_uc15 timezone = America/Los_Angeles

scenarios.name: Create pickup stop
scenarios.prompt: insert into transport_route_stops id = trs_pickup_uc15 biz_id = biz_mobile_uc15 route_id = tr_daily_uc15 stop_order = 0 kind = depot name = BaseDepot location_id = loc_uc15 offset_from_start_min = 0 dwell_min = 10

scenarios.name: Create customer stop
scenarios.prompt: insert into transport_route_stops id = trs_customer_uc15 biz_id = biz_mobile_uc15 route_id = tr_daily_uc15 stop_order = 1 kind = dropoff name = CustomerStop offset_from_start_min = 30 dwell_min = 45

scenarios.name: Create mobile service offer
scenarios.prompt: insert into offers id = ofr_grooming_uc15 biz_id = biz_mobile_uc15 name = MobileGroomingOffer slug = mobile-grooming-offer execution_mode = route_trip status = active is_published = true timezone = America/Los_Angeles

scenarios.name: Create offer version
scenarios.prompt: insert into offer_versions id = ov_grooming_uc15 biz_id = biz_mobile_uc15 offer_id = ofr_grooming_uc15 version = 1 status = published duration_mode = fixed default_duration_min = 60 min_duration_min = 60 max_duration_min = 60 base_price_minor = 8000 currency = USD

scenarios.name: Create planned trip
scenarios.prompt: insert into transport_trips id = tt_uc15_001 biz_id = biz_mobile_uc15 route_id = tr_daily_uc15 offer_version_id = ov_grooming_uc15 driver_resource_id = res_mike status = planned departure_at = 2026-02-24T09:00:00Z arrival_at = 2026-02-24T10:00:00Z capacity_seats = 1 overbook_seats = 0

scenarios.name: Create dispatch task
scenarios.prompt: insert into dispatch_tasks id = dt_uc15_001 biz_id = biz_mobile_uc15 trip_id = tt_uc15_001 assigned_resource_id = res_mike title = VisitCustomerHouse status = assigned due_at = 2026-02-24T10:00:00Z

scenarios.name: Log ETA event
scenarios.prompt: insert into eta_events id = eta_uc15_001 biz_id = biz_mobile_uc15 trip_id = tt_uc15_001 route_stop_id = trs_customer_uc15 event_type = eta_updated event_at = 2026-02-24T09:40:00Z eta_at = 2026-02-24T09:52:00Z
